column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Phnom Penh Municipal Gendarmerie at 12:30 pm on August 12
column4: 2020  went to a hotel called Kandal Suan in Chaktomuk Sangkat
column5: and arrested many Chinese people for kidnapping offenses. ------Lt. Gen. Rath Sreang
column6: Deputy Commander of the National Gendarmerie and Commander of the Phnom Penh Municipal Gendarmerie
column7: said that forces detained 29 Chinese nationals
column8: including 3 women.------The operation took place after authorities received information that the suspects were involved kidnapping of Chinese nationals
column9: and police rescued three victims.------ Currently
column10: the Phnom Penh Military Police is questioning the suspects to build a case according to the procedure. ------NKD
